LanguageData.SelectFuelsToolTip: 选择应该可作为燃料的东西。此处选择的项目将显示在每个相关建筑的「燃料」选项卡上。从那里你可以决定你的殖民者到底会添加什么作为燃料。\n\n取消勾选该建筑物通常使用的任何资源（例如：篝火所使用的木材）将禁用该建筑的「燃料」选项卡，并且将还原为仅使用其原始设定燃料。
LanguageData.UseMassToolTip: Items with zero mass will be ignored.
LanguageData.ZeroPotentialNotice: Resources with zero fuel potential are not listed.
LanguageData.EnableTargetFuelLevelLabel: Enable configurable target fuel level for all objects using fuel selection
LanguageData.EnableTargetFuelLevelToolTip: With a configurable target fuel level you can select how much fuel should be maintained in that building.
LanguageData.EnableWithNonFuelLabel: Enable fuel selection even for fueled objects which rely on non-fuel resources
LanguageData.EnableWithNonFuelToolTip: This affects anything that is normally fueled by something NOT selected here.
LanguageData.ShowFuelPotentialToolTip: Fuel value per unit when compared to {0}
LanguageData.MessageFuelSettingsSaved: Current fuel choices for {0} saved as a preset.
